column1: Payment information error. Please start over.
Please verify the card with the issuer bank before placing the order.
column2: Verificer kortet hos udstedelsesbanken før ordren gennemføres.

column1: Please verify the card with the issuer bank:
The card has failed verification with the issuer bank.
There has been wrong payment information submitted or the time limit has expired. Please, try again.
column2: Der er givet forkerte betalingsoplysninger, eller tidsgrænsen er udløbet. Prøv igen.

column1: There has been wrong payment information submitted or time limit has expired. Please, try again.
column2: Der er givet forkerte betalingsoplysninger, eller tidsgrænsen er udløbet. Prøv igen.

column1: This card has failed validation and cannot be used.
column2: Kortet fejlede verifikationen og kan ikke bruges.

column1: This card has failed validation, but it is possible to place the order.
column2: Kortet fejlede verifikationen, men ordren kan stadig gennemføres.

column1: To ensure the security of your transactions
column2: For at sikre sikkerheden i dine transaktioner
